website_summaries.verdict: This sprayer can handle big jobs but is simple enough for beginners.
pros: Reversible tip works well to clear clogs
cons: Suction tube has a hard time reaching to the bottom of a 5-gallon bucket

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: It took me a gallon of paint to get the pressure/spray pattern correct. Once learned, it performed perfectly. I even ran out of paint once and it was easy to reprime the gun and continue spraying. Clean up was as described in the manual and fairly easy but does take time if you do it correctly. I took the nozzle and filter apart to clean because I learned from a previous gun that the more you clean the better it is for the next time. Like any tool: take care of them and they will give you years of service.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you can put it together correctly
customer_reviews.text: This took 4 calls to manufacturer. Don't forget to use the little plastic seal/washer that doesn't show in the parts included in the book. Without it you will have paint everywhere. With it, we painted a door in 5 minutes. Works great if you can put it together correctly. Ladies on the phone were very patient and helpful
customer_reviews.author: Diana B.

customer_reviews.title: I would like to see a longer suction tube as it has ...
customer_reviews.text: The machine worked well, I would like to see a longer suction tube as it has a difficult time reaching the bottom of a 5 gal pail of paint. Had to place the machine on a small box to get it high enough for the suction tube to reach the bottom of the pail....Other than that....it worked well....painted my house in 5 hours with the assistance of my wife....I sprayed....She back rolled.....
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Tested and practice with clear water and I found there ...
customer_reviews.text: Tested and practice with clear water and I found there is leaking and dripping coming from the Spray Gun, Due to the Spray tip and Spray Guard assembly is not perfectly coupled. A backward shot was causing dripping when spraying . I double checked with user menu and re_assembled the Spray Gun but not help. So before using it for real paint, you need test it with clear water to avoid paint dripping to floor and your sleeve. Anyway Amazon let me return it and exchange another unit. Beside the Spray Gun issue, the other part of the system was working well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Liang

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece but worked for a minute.
customer_reviews.text: This worked as it should have but half way through my first paint job the part between the hose and sprayer started spraying paint on myself and the floor got covered. It was quite funny but it sucked and made a huge mess. I thankfully was able to return it and got a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Clair

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and wears out after first use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this airless paint sprayer to repaint the exterior of a house. But after a couple hours of it's first use, the sprayer will not stop spraying until the power is shut off. Dissassembled and cleaned everything but nothing seems to help. The trouble shooting in the manual claims the stop ball is either dirty or the seat for it is worn out. So if all it takes is a couple hours of use to wear this product out, look elsewhere for something better. Zero stars for a cheaply made sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer wa banker

customer_reviews.title: Use a brush and roller. Save yourself the time and frustration.
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. I went through running water to find all the bad connection points, which were literally every conceivable place a connection exists on this junk. Finally got it all tight, then went to prime and paint. My picture speaks for itself. I followed all directions in the manual. You should compensate me for wasting so much time and instantly falling behind my schedule. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: The few negative reviews I have read about this machine made me think I wasted my money; But after receiving it and using it, I am really happy with it. I bought it primarily, because of having to paint an entire ceiling which is quite high. I purchased an extension pole to use with the machine and painted the entire thing in a relatively short time. I don't know how I could have ever done this without a power painter like this one. The only issue is over spray. This can be a real problem if everything is not masked off properly. Great machine, and works well for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Seals failed, never got it to work, would not replace or refund
customer_reviews.text: On the first attempt to use the sprayer the seals on the spray mechanism leaked and sprayed paint everywhere. Several attempts were made by out staff to get the sprayer to work properly. After several hours attempting to get it working it just shut down and would not start again. We made two attempts to get Amazon or the seller to replace or refund = crickets. Not even a response to our inquiry. Totally unresponsive seller and Amazon would not acknowledge the product being faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L

customer_reviews.title: Great price value proposition
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered worked once then completely failed. It was graciously and quickly replaced and the second one works great. I was able to paint the exterior of my house in just a few days. Important helpful hint: Follow the priming and preparing instructions step by step every time you use it. And, take the extra time to clean it thouroughly as instructed when you're done working each day. It takes at least 30 minutes to clean it as instructed. I used water based paints and clean up was pretty easy. I would imagine oil based paints using paint thinner would be much more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: CraigInSanDiego

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for this product. We wanted a paint sprayer that could directly go into the paint bucket instead of a small container. This one had good reviews for the most part. We used this product over the weekend. I suggest reading the instructions over and over again. We had some issues on our part, not the product itself. Overall it painted great and we were very satisfied. Fairly easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: S- Tx

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I do not generally write product reviews. They are not worth it. This thing is worth me taking the time to say I love it! It is a paint sprayer, so yes, clean-up sucks. I am particular and want it to work right each time, so clean-up takes me a while. But performance? I painted the entire living room in under 10 minutes, came out with no splatter or spray on me, and used far less paint than if I had used a roller. I will not paint without one of these again. Nothing is perfect, so 4 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Than Some Other Brands I Have Used.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Painted cabinet doors and they look like they came from the factory. Getting the flow just right for the right pattern take some doing but once set it stays there. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michal Birdsell

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated had to pay return shipping of 17.00
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were totally confusing and get this, I had to pay for return shipping!! Hey amazon- not cool I couldn’t ever recall when I got something couldn’t use it and it’s brand new and had to pay shipping. Watch out everyone here comes a flash back of those good old eBay days!!
customer_reviews.author: crystal Bolduc

customer_reviews.title: Reliable sprayer
customer_reviews.text: The pump is of very good quality The gun and spray tip can be of better quality. At higher pressure it leaks The priming can take a while, For the money , it is still a very good reliable sprayer to get your job done. Overall I’m not dissapointed. I’ll get a better paint gun with better tips to make it up. Recommend it for the semi pro painter
customer_reviews.author: Hector Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: cheap Chinese knock off
customer_reviews.text: Could not use it at high altitude, it doesn't have enough pressure. It clearly is an concept stolen straight from American Graco units which are unfortunately soooo much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a few small DIY projects and ended up using it to paint our entire upstairs *ceilings & walls, a new shed, all interior doors and so many little things in between. Super easy to set up, use and clean. Over spray is adjustable and just really depends on the paint your using. But for the investment I can honestly say we've got our money's worth and will continue to use it for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: What a mess
customer_reviews.text: The pump took forever to prime with water.I had to poor a cup in the inlet hose. After seeing the low output with the water I should have stopped right then but I decided to try paint. Not enough pressure to atomize the latex paint. Had to return unit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Great for large jobs, but lots of cleanup required. Make sure you tighten all the fittings.
customer_reviews.text: Worth it for painting a very large fence - Lots of cleanup afterwards but for large jobs it's much faster than any alternative. Make sure you have all the fittings very tight - the instructions say some of the fittings should be hand-tightened but you really need a wrench to make sure things don't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Tobin

customer_reviews.title: First time using an airless sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this sprayer. I was able to paint 2500sq ft of ceilings in 8 hours! It was easy to learn and has never clogged. I don’t need thin the paint at all. I’ve also used it to paint my walls and it is quick and easy. Clean up is much easier than washing rollers and pans! I’m so glad I took a gamble on learning how to use this sprayer! It has saved my back and arm muscles!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Park

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after 30 minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: Just like many of the reviews say, it worked for about 30 minutes and then the gun started to leak where the spray tip goes into the spray guard. Was painting doors (laid down flat) and the leaking caused huge blobs of paint to land on the doors. I cleaned everything and reassembled and it still leaked like crazy. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PEICE OF CRAP
customer_reviews.text: It work for about an hour and will no longer draw paint. I have tried all the troubleshooting steps as well as completely cleaning the hoses valves and gun nothing worked, this it the biggest piece of junk I have ever bought. You are better off with a brush it will save you time and headache.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D. White

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Applied two coats of stain to my Garage/workshop addition - took about 1 1/2 hours per coat. Would have been DAYS to apply 8 gal of stain on rough sawn siding with a brush. Perfect. Sprayed 2 coats on the inside walls (1/2 CDX) with a few gallons of white and it put on a GREAT smooth, no run layers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, easy to use product.  Just don't forget to remove the label and apply oil before starting.
customer_reviews.text: Got the job done (stained fence) with no major issues. Did have a couple of clogs along the way, but nothing major. Well worth the cost. I was quoted $1500 to stain my fence. I did it for just under $500 counting 30 gallons of stain and the sprayer. And, I still have an almost new sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Elcid 76

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny for me.  Huge time saver!
customer_reviews.text: Joe homeowner with a big deck to paint. This thing is amazing for the money. If you hate painting railings and balusters as much as do I, this sprayer is worth every penny. Sprayed two coats of solid stain on a well worn 20' x 30' pressure treated deck and made it look like new. Now, on to the garden shed then I'm handing if off to my son to do his place. Easy to clean, very clear instructions. Normal Graco accessories including extensions and tips fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Grounded regulator first uses
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, worked for half the job then the regulator seal blew out, grounded switch and now pops gfci. Pait leaking from regulator. I purchased it 7 months ago but just opened box to use today. So cant return or get help from amozon
customer_reviews.author: Jamz-

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to prime and paint my house (new construction). It has performed flawlessly. Spayed 3000 sq ft of walls with no issues. This is near replica of the Name brand model, works just as well, for far cheaper. I can’t speak to its lifespan but it got me through this part of the process and that’s all I was really hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Hose leaks
customer_reviews.text: When we finally got ready to use the sprayer the connector on the hose leaks. Unfortunately we waited to long to test it and the return window closed. If you make this purchase test it right away so you don't get stuck looking for a replacement hose. Very disappointed in the short return window. Can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Paint came out of every possibly join. Finally tightened everything but tons of paint dripped off the nozzle. I wasted a gallon of paint, had a mess, and wasted one afternoon. I asked my neighbor to borrow the nozzle from his Graco spray printer and it worked. So my nozzle was useless out of the box. The Graco spray painter has better quality, buy that one.
customer_reviews.author: Hecho en Mexico

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came with spare parts...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Hardly used any paint! I would have given it 4 stars but halfway through my project it started to leak. The Depot brand seals are too small, so I wound up buying a whole new tip and seal with holder for $50 to finish. I wish the suction hose was a bit longer. Moving the unit along with a 5 gallon bucket of paint was awkward. But it did a nice job of spraying.
customer_reviews.author: llamamama654

customer_reviews.title: Voltage is 110v!
customer_reviews.text: So, If you live in a country that uses international electricity (220v), you have to buy a step down converter or find another sprayer. HomeRight have to point that out in the Product description, or, simply use double volt motor! Unless they focus on the US market only. I didn't try the product though.
customer_reviews.author: Dohab

customer_reviews.title: the machine worked for about a half hour and then quit.  Motor would not restart.
customer_reviews.text: Machine worked for about a half hour and then quit. Motor would not restart even after trying many things. I would like to talk to a someone who could help find the problem or I will return it. Please contact me. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for my 40 year old paint pump
customer_reviews.text: I have used it twice now and it as performed perfectly. If I would offer any suggestions I would buy some filter socks for the inlet hose in the paint. I would also suggest replacement filters that go in the spray gun. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Ketcherside

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have used this to paint 2000 foot of wood fence. Excellent quality and once you get the hang of painting with it, works fantastic. Does not waste paint and very mobile due to size and weight. Well worth the price for our use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: It was missing pieces so I never got it to actually work. It's not sitting in the garage collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sprayer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sprayer for the price! Painted my whole house. Sprayer covers in one coat. Easy to clean and maintain. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. Did our basement ceiling in a day. After my past sprayer experience I wasn't very optimistic, this was so simple all around. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have used it once so far on a picket fence, no problems. It was a good price, and it arrived on time, and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Danny J Harding

customer_reviews.title: Just another cheap piece of junk made in China.
customer_reviews.text: I used this paint sprayer for 2 days, suddenly it stopped working, I flushed it out and cleaned it, put it back together and prepared it according to the instructions, to no avail. You are better off renting one from a home improvement store. The rental did not work any better I finally resorted to a 5 dollar roller and the results are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: hidee

customer_reviews.title: lasted one day
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one day had to take it apart to get it working. Was in the middle of painting farm fence did not want to jump through hoops and wait for replacement. After got it working then the sprayer went out. Had to go to Sherwin Williams and bought a whole new one for $100.00 more. Seems like Amazon sometimes is not worth it on certain items. B
customer_reviews.author: rock

customer_reviews.title: Once you get the hang it's all plain sailing from there!!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit to learn how to use ( having not used anything like it before). It does do a great job though once you get used to it. Saved me hours out of doing numerous doors. But once you've done a coat or two it's exactly what you'd want. Have yet to use on walls or within the house but I can't see any difficulty with using this product. Sorry I didn't use it before on home rehab projects.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: ... know so paint got everywhere but the company was amazing and sent us a new part in two days ...
customer_reviews.text: I was missing a little seal part when I got it and I didn't know so paint got everywhere but the company was amazing and sent us a new part in two days free and works better than I expected. simple to use just have to keep it clean. a very well worth buy on large projects
customer_reviews.author: YeeOld75

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The gun will not shut off when trigger is released. Makes an awful mess of things? As well as leakage around nozzle
customer_reviews.author: Paul Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped it would be and more. Watched ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped it would be and more. Watched the video on You Tube. Piece of cake! I did purchase a 50' hose after reading another reviewer who did the same thing. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: fastgramps

customer_reviews.title: Paints great
customer_reviews.text: Paints fantastic once primed and ready. Cleaning out is still a pain. That main hose holds a lot of paint. Takes a lot of water to clean out. Also seems like more prep in covering everything else. With that said, it paints great and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Ok on most thinner paints
customer_reviews.text: It does not work well with very heavy base paints.
customer_reviews.author: Professional

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to paint my house. I read the directions and did everything they said to do prior to use and it died about for swipes into painting my house. Pump locked up. Total garbage
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Cut my time in half. Lots of over spray, cover everything.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer
customer_reviews.text: This is a professional paint sprayer. Be careful not to get too much paint on whatever you are painting. It really puts the paint out fast.
customer_reviews.author: randy d beck

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Can paint the house in no time with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Kept clogging and when it didn’t clog the hose leaked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Used this to paint my house. Very impressed. It took longer to wash the house than painting. Neighbor purchased a similar big name brand and had issues with it the whole time. I did not. Ran perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Louie7740

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer is great once you get it to work
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer is great once you get it to work! We had some issues with paint dripping until we figured out just the right way to assemble everything.
customer_reviews.author: David Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer by the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sprayer for use only with oil base paint and primer. I was surprised with the performance and quality for the price. I have been a professional painter for more than 20 years. My other sprayer is titan 440.
customer_reviews.author: Moacir Gregorio

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good. Rather easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. Rather easy to use. You will use more paint with this system, but it will save you time. You have to clean it thoroughly and store appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: usevansb

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Useful, easy to use and very handy. Recommended for everyone, wanted to do house painting your home.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Aranilla Cabutihan

customer_reviews.title: EXELENT
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, works well. It's not just as good as the "Pro's" it actually IS one of the Pro's! (Different label, but same machine!)
customer_reviews.author: Audie Collins

customer_reviews.title: Need better replacement
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box for the first time and it was damaged. The product was not fully sealed and covered. One of the items was cracked and damaged and cannot be attached to its proper piece connection. The box itself was a complete disaster and from the get go, I knew my package and everything inside was destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Malaetia Ofagalilo

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer works great, but the gun started leaking after one day ...
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer works great, but the gun started leaking after one day and I needed to use it two more days to finish my house. So I bought an aftermarket gun and used it with no problems. Amazon did replace the entire unit and I have used it for more painting but I saved the factory gun for a spare. Great sprayer, just follow the maintenance instructions for cleaning and storage which is extremely important for paint sprayers. Gun seems to be the weak link.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for the price. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Baker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not the greatest but will do the job spits alot and flow with change a lot
customer_reviews.author: Milton E.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this worked. Paint started splashing from both ends. This was a mess. Wasted paint and time.
customer_reviews.author: KAUSER FATIMA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Worked flawlessly. Purchased it to prime and paint my garage. If you want a paint sprayer that performs just as good as ones almost twice the price this is it!
customer_reviews.author: shawn bakk

customer_reviews.title: Ferget a roller and tray..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little piston sprayer. Used for a job spraying 5 small houses. Awesome value for the price point. Plenty of hose length. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: William Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Paint gun
customer_reviews.text: Painted ceiling in my house in two hours works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: troy smith

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made this purchase. It made my project easier.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was intimidated with using it. However, once I began painting, I was excited with the ease and how fast I finished my paint job.
customer_reviews.author: Marjie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This never has clogged. Perfect spray pattern too! Just make sure to clean it well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit for the price. Would most definitely reccomend for the do it yourselfer. A strong very little machine!
customer_reviews.author: Milton L Brazell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sealed my entire house and three decks in no time, never had an issue at all
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN R.

customer_reviews.title: I just have to figure out the best setting on pressure
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived. Brought it to my job site to paint the house. Followed the directions on how to prime the paint and used it for the very first time. Forget the paint rollers! This is much faster. I also used 30" extension for ceiling. Completed a small single room in 30min or so. I just have to figure out the best setting on pressure. If I can complete 2500sqft home with this paint machine, I'll be saving alot of $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Jung

customer_reviews.title: On the box it was missing the Oil to lubricate ...
customer_reviews.text: On the box it was missing the Oil to lubricate the pump and The sprayer gun is to cheap ! After 30 Minutes it started to leak paint,
customer_reviews.author: Jesus García

customer_reviews.title: Stop machine
customer_reviews.text: No good quality. Because i use 1 month Stop machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No goi
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, this is the only way I will ever paint again. No rolling for me any more.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I painted a 2400 sq feet with this little spray machine
customer_reviews.author: Lalo villegas

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful! Don't use indoors unless you want everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful! Don't use indoors unless you want everything (walls, floors, ceiling) covered in the same color\primer!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: The airless worked just great for me
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping to me, The airless worked just great for me , didn't have to thin the paint just crank up the pressure a little more.
customer_reviews.author: freddie lacy

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My old sprayer died and I bought this because of the price. I was surprised at how well it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great paint sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like it should, changed the filter and tip for the recommended usage. Followed the instructions, no trouble with priming or painting or cleaning. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Novice Painter

customer_reviews.title: Quit working the second day I used it.
customer_reviews.text: I used the sprayer one day and it worked very well. I cleaned it according to the directions. I was using it the second day and it quit drawing paint from the bucket. I cleaned it and tried to prime it again and it would not draw anything.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t want to work
customer_reviews.text: I only use it one time and now this clock and don’t want to work
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dejesus

customer_reviews.title: worked great, made painting fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: This worked great, just be sure to clean it out completely after use.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick, packaging was neat and tidy. Used it once for about 20 minutes, cleaned it, put it away. Got it out the next day so a professional painter could use it on my house and it broke after a few minutes, with paint gushing out of every space. It blew back so hard my painter was absolutely drenched and he is lucky he wasn't injured. It warped the tip and inside the nozzle. I'll give a better review if customer service is good on their warranty, but so far I'd say stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk...waste of $200 get something easier to figure out
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My painter liked this do much, I bought him one. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Malone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this sprayer. Easy to use and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and makes a huge mess.
customer_reviews.text: This is total garbage. Paint leaked out from the hose connection and made a huge mess. We tried everything to rectify the leaking problem but to no avail. Now we have to rent a power sprayer to get all the paint off the patio that leaked and we have to rent a paint sprayer. Oh, and we spent hours masking off all of our windows for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael jones

customer_reviews.title: I am by no means a professional painter and this sprayer worked perfectly for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used any king of sprayer before. I am by no means a professional painter and this sprayer worked perfectly for me! I would definetly recomend this to enyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F Chapman

customer_reviews.title: 1st time I have ever used a sprayer and it ...
customer_reviews.text: 1st time I have ever used a sprayer and it was effortless. I painted both of my houses and my husband watched. Just remember not to get any air bubbles in it. If you do then just turn the knob back to prime until it's ready to spray again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dischinger

customer_reviews.title: Would never paint without it.
customer_reviews.text: I was off work for a week and planed on painting my house, I order this machine. I primed ceiling walls and wood work with a shellac based primer. clean the machine up with ammonia. Simple. The walls and ceilings were painted Benjamin Moore Aura acrylic paint. The stuff was thick like pancake batter, and the machine sprayed it like it was water. Finally the woodwork was painted with Benjamin Moore ADVANCE waterborne interior alkyd paints. It cleaned up with soap and water and the house looks professionally done.
customer_reviews.author: B. Walther

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap, gloggs up and gun refuses to work after third use. Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.author: A. V. Zogbi

customer_reviews.title: Makes short work of large projects
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Makes short work of large projects. The Bad: I hate the cleanup. It won’t get the last gallon from a 5 gallon bucket. The unit easy to use and does a really good job. My only problem is that the unit won’t get all the paint from a container.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Weekes

customer_reviews.title: The best thing is now we have our own sprayer with ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit cost just about the same as it would have cost me to rent a airless sprairer. The best thing is now we have our own sprayer with no rent. We do not regret buying this unit a all everyone that owns a house should have one of these airless sprayers. YES WE RECOMMEND THIS SPRAYER VERY HIGHLY. The best thing is how FAST you can cover a house. If it had a 30 inch wand you could paint a single house without a ladder. moving the ladder did slow down the job. Having said all this DON'T RENT OWN you own!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Better than renting
customer_reviews.text: I had to paint an entire 1000 sq ft apartment, ceilings included. This sprayer worked well and saved me days! It is a bit of a pain to clean. It also takes a bit to get accustomed to using a power sprayer if you haven't used one before
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: poor
customer_reviews.text: the sprayer gun does not work properly, leaks, poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Steven Walker

customer_reviews.title: the paint I used to paint a house was apparently ...
customer_reviews.text: the paint I used to paint a house was apparently too thick for the machine. I had to dilute the paint for the machine to spray it.
customer_reviews.author: doug wilks

customer_reviews.title: pays for itself in time and supplies!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the homeright fine finish for smaller projects, but for covering walls, it just took too much time. This does a fantastic job and it's quick! Takes a few minutes to set up and clean, but it's not rocket science. Just a heads up, thin your paint. I had to clean it out twice (still only took a few minutes) because I was using a thick latex paint. After I thinned it, there was no stopping it. If you're doing big projects on a budget, this is definitely a great choice. The paint went on smoothly and evenly. Very impressed and happy!
customer_reviews.author: bobwiley

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Paint Sprayer, I am a woman to begin with and I have never worked a spray gun, much less one so powerful. I loved the way it handled and the way the paint flowed. Also clean up was not so bad.. I would recommend this Airless paint sprayer to my family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Woodrum

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Right out of box following all instrucions of perp and set up and would not even start
customer_reviews.author: Sue D.

customer_reviews.title: HomeRight C800879 Power- Flo 2800
customer_reviews.text: First time user and found it easy to use. It did a very nice job. Yes i would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Boughton

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working / pumping in middle of the paint job out of nowhere. I primed and cleaned and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Amador

product_meta.title: HomeRight Power Flo Pro 2800 C800879 Airless Paint Sprayer Spray Gun, Power Painting for Home Exterior, Fence, Shed, and Garage 2800 psi, 0.24 gpm
product_meta.description:
The new Finish Max Extra does it all. From furniture and cabinets to fences and walls. This sprayer can cover a wider array of projects and coatings with less thinning and hassle.

SPRAY YOUR LARGE, HOUSEHOLD PROJECTS WITH EASE
Large, household projects are no longer intimidating thanks to the Power-Flo Pro 2800 airless paint sprayer! By doing painting and staining projects yourself, you’ll end up saving thousands of dollars and still walk away with a beautiful finish.

EXCEEDS TRADITIONAL ROLLER AND PAINTBRUSH
This heavy-duty sprayer applies an even coating to uneven surfaces, which makes it the go-to option when painting your home exterior, garage, shed or fence.

SPRAY A VARIETY OF MATERIALS
The Power-Flo Pro is ideal for spraying unthinned latex and oil-based paints, stains, and sealers. The pressure of 2,800 psi allows you to tackle large projects, quickly and with professional results.
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR LARGE PAINTING PROJECTS: Spray a superior finish on household projects with this airless paint sprayer (home exterior, sheds, fences, garages, decks, etc.)
SUPERB PERFORMANCE: With an 1/2 HP motor, this airless paint gun delivers 2800 psi to spray unthinned paint
ULTIMATE CONTROL: Dial in the perfect spray pattern with the pressure control knob for ultimate customization of paint flow
EASY MANUEVERING: 25 foot long, non-kink hose to easily reach your painting project. Draws paint directly from a 1 or 5 gallon container
HOUSEHOLD USE ONLY: This is the perfect paint sprayer for a homeowner to accomplish Do-It-Yourself projects without having to hire a professional.Max tip size is .015
